alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Lexington; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 26 at 10:57PM EDT until March 26 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL LEXINGTON...EAST CENTRAL AIKEN AND NORTHWESTERN ORANGEBURG COUNTIES... At 1057 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 12 miles southwest of Gaston, or 16 miles south of Red Bank, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Gaston, Swansea, North, Pelion, Perry, Woodford, Perry Airport, Thor, Lexington County Airport At Pelion and Peachtree Rock. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to an interior room or closet on the lowest floor of a sturdy building immediately.
